verses.verse: וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra called יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko And Jacob אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about בָּנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav; unto his sons וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, and said הֵאָֽסְפוּ֙ <S%H622><s%> he-'a-se-Fu Gather yourselves together וְאַגִּ֣ידָה <S%H5046><s%> ve-'ag-Gi-dah that I may tell לָכֶ֔ם la-Chem, אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- what יִקְרָ֥א <S%H7122><s%> yik-Ra you [that] which shall befall אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem בְּאַחֲרִ֥ית <S%H319><s%> be-'a-cha-Rit you in the last הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> hai-ya-Mim. days

[it] he went up פ Peh
